description:
Mozgus, in his Apostle form.
After http://anidb.net/ch91831 [the Egg of The Perfect World] turns him into an apostle spawn, his transformed state being a reflection of his religious ideals. He gains large, white-feathered wings that he is able to use in his human form. In his transformed state his feathers turn grey and harden giving a similar appearance to closed fists. His body becomes completely encased in the hardened feathers giving him an armored, scaly appearance.
Source: Berserk Wiki
name: Mozgus
